data.title: Lea Grundig Age, Birthday, Zodiac Sign and Birth Chart
data.meta_description: Astrology details of Lea Grundig such as age, birthday, zodiac sign, and natal chart. Analyze their birth chart and kundli to understand their personality and cause of death through astrology.
data.text:
Lea Grundig (1906 – 1977) was a prominent East German politician, illustrator, painter, university professor, and graphic designer. Born in Dresden, she was known for her artistic and academic contributions. Grundig's work spanned various mediums and emphasized social issues reflective of her time. She passed away at the age of 71 in the Mediterranean. Her legacy includes both her artistic endeavors and her role in political discourse, showing the intersection of art and politics in 20th century Germany.
